Text: Secure your agendaDear Colleague If your business is about Home Networks Gateways Connected Appliances and Internet Services check your agenda and make sure to be available to attend NetatHome to be held in Nice on November and NetatHome will be the largest Conference and Exhibition ever organised in Europe in the field of Home Networks Gateways Connected Appliances and Internet Services providing an excellent opportunity to keep up to date with the latest developments in this important and growing market Many industry leaders have already confirmed their support to NetatHome and their commitment in exhibiting there their most advanced solutions EasyPlug Echelon MetaVector Technologies Tridium Zensys ProSyst Gatespace DS emWare Starseed Entreprises Konnex Moreover most leading Industry Associations active in the field have confirmed their support to NetatHome and their commitment not only to disseminate information on this event among their members but also to organise on Nov working group meetings information workshops or annual general meetings in association with this important event Among these Associations HomeRF PLCforum The ECHONET Consortium eamracom Konnex The LonUsers Groups OSGi CABA ePowerTomorrow This week from November to is therefore likely to be a key one for everyone interested in the European and global business of Home Networks Gateways Connected Appliances and Internet Services If you have not yet registered you can register on line and obtain detailed and uptodate information on the event at our web site You can alternatively call us Looking forward to seeing you in Nice at the end of November Yours sincerely Karine Valin Marketing Manager Sigma Consultants Tel Fax route des Dolines BP Valbonne Sophia Antipolis Cedex France Sigma Consultants founded in and based in Sophia Antipolis France is a leading European provider of information services in the fields of Information Technologies Energy and the Environment Please feel free to forward this mail as widely as you can to anybody you think may be interested in NetatHome We respect your online time and Internet privacy If youd prefer not to receive further information on NetatHome just reply to this message by including the word remove in the subject line We will then promptly remove your name from our mailing list Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience

ome HighlightsDear friends and colleagues All Europeans have been following the horrific events taking place in the US over the last few days and we are all extremely shocked by this tragedy We would like to extend our deepest sympathy to all Americans and sincerely hope that none of you or relativesfriendscolleagues has been terribly impacted by these events We are also very comforted when seeing Americans determination strength and confidence in the future Sigma Consultants We are happy to bring to you the following news related to NetatHome the largest European Conference Exhibition on Home Networks and Gateways Connected Appliances and Internet Services to be held in Nice France from November to NetatHome will offer attendees excellent opportunities to network with their worldwide peers in a relaxed environment with a targeted audience willing to spend time and money investigating the opportunities presented by the event All details on this unique opportunity to access reliable comprehensive and up to date information and to develop business are available on the event dedicated web site Sophia Antipolis September NetatHome an invaluable opportunity A lot happened during this supposed quiet summer period Things are going so well that almost no sponsorship opportunities remain after Siemens HomeRF DS WrapMerloni Konnex and MetaVector Technologies recently joined the pool of event sponsors Space at the exhibition is selling out fast and the highly interactive strategic conference is set to be the event of the year in Europe for all industry professionals menuhtm the event has already attracted enormous interest from the market leaders in this sector and months prior to the beginning of this exceptional week over people already signedup In November over attendees are expected to come for what will undoubtedly be the largest event in the field of Home Networks Gateways Connected Appliances and Internet Services in Europe Thank you for the time you have taken to go through this message Please do not hesitate to contact us for any further information you would need Register now and sleep soundly For those who did not register yet please note that facing the fastgrowing success of the event we have only a few hotel rooms left to offer to non partner attendees It is thus obvious that the quicker you will register the greater your chances to benefit from two free nights at the Mridien Hotel will be Register now and save money to visit Nice Karine Valin Marketing Manager Sigma Consultants Tel Fax route des Dolines BP Valbonne Sophia Antipolis Cedex France Sigma Consultants founded in and based in Sophia Antipolis France is a leading European provider of information services in the fields of Information Technologies Energy and the Environment
